org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.validate
Interface IAeValidationHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeDefaultValidationHandler
public interface IAeValidationHandler

Interface used by the deployment code. Allows the deployment code to validate the bpr as a whole (doPredeploymentValidation) and then validate each IAeProcessDeployment before adding it to the engine.

Method Summary
 void doDeploymentValidation(java.lang.String aPddLocation, IAeProcessDeployment aDeployment, IAeBaseErrorReporter aReporter)
          Validate the process deployment.
 void doPredeploymentValidation(IAeBpr aBpr, IAeBaseErrorReporter aReporter)
          Validate the bpr file.
